doc:
Sarah G. Buxton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarah_G._Buxton 0 Sarah Galbraith Buxton (born March 23, 1965) is an American actress. She has appeared in films such as Lovelines (1984), The Sure Thing (1985) and Less Than Zero (1987), and well as guest starred in a number of television shows in early career. On television, Buxton is best known for playing villainous Annie Douglas Richards in the NBC soap opera, Sunset Beach from 1997 to 1999. She later played another soap villain, Morgan DeWitt, on The Bold and the Beautiful (2000–01, 2005). Sarah_Galbraith_Buxton ( born March_23_,_1965 ) is an_American_actress . She has_appeared in films such_as Lovelines ( 1984_) , The_Sure_Thing_(_1985_)_and_Less Than Zero_(_1987_) , and well as guest starred in a_number of television_shows in early_career . On television , Buxton is_best_known for playing villainous_Annie_Douglas_Richards in the_NBC_soap_opera , Sunset_Beach from 1997 to 1999 . She later played another_soap_villain , Morgan_DeWitt , on The_Bold and the_Beautiful_(_2000 – 01 , 2005_) .
